entries.text: FedEx's official customer support page provides support routing for tracking, shipping, account, and billing issues.
FedEx provides a separate official tracking page for shipment status and delivery updates.
FedEx maintains separate support/help resources and self-service content outside the main tracking experience.
Shipment claims, damaged package issues, and billing questions are typically routed through specialized support paths, increasing customer effort when the issue is unclear.
Parcel delivery support remains a high-friction category in public regulatory and customer-service studies, with recurring issues around delivery problems, contact handling, and complaint resolution.

current_strengths: Official customer support hub for multiple issue types
current_gaps_observed_or_likely: Tracking, claims, billing, and support remain split across separate surfaces
No public evidence of one support thread across text, voice, and handoff
No public customer-visible issue tracker spanning support interactions
No public conversational resolution layer for delivery, claims, and billing workflows
